backend/main.mo: Canister handling user profiles and per-user composition storage with authorization checks and CRUD functions for compositions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old composition entries to the new format by renaming the data field to composerData.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file related to audio, composer, studio UI, and supporting hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes used across the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app and mounting it to the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing authentication, profile setup, studio UI, composer state, and unsaved-change handling.
frontend/src/audio/audioImport.ts: Utilities for validating, reading, and extracting duration metadata from imported audio files.
frontend/src/audio/audioTypes.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining composition structure, including channels, amp settings, piano roll notes, and imported audio.
Serialization helpers encoding composition state to JSON bytes and restoring it with defaults for new fields.
frontend/src/audio/useAudioEngine.ts: React hook that initializes an audio engine, manages playback state, gain nodes, guitar amp processing, and imported audio.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Authentication button that triggers login/logout using Internet Identity and updates UI and query state.
frontend/src/features/composer/AudioTrac: Component for importing, validating, previewing, and attaching audio files to a composition.
frontend/src/features/composer/ComposerS: Main composer UI with piano roll, audio import, and playback controls wrapped in a tabbed interface.
frontend/src/features/composer/PianoRoll: Interactive piano roll editor enabling note creation, deletion, zooming, and visualization of timeline steps.
frontend/src/features/studio/AmpPanel.ts: Guitar amp settings panel with knobs and sliders for adjusting EQ, drive, presence, and master levels.
frontend/src/features/studio/Composition: UI for saving, loading, and deleting compositions using composition hooks, with input for naming and a list of saved items.
frontend/src/features/studio/InstrumentP: Displays drum and instrument step sequencers with toggles for notes and steps, organized in tabs.
Provides channel volume, mute, and solo controls plus a master volume slider for the studio mixer.
frontend/src/features/studio/TransportBa: Play/pause transport controls and a tempo slider for controlling studio playback.
frontend/src/features/studio/YouTubePlay: Loads or searches YouTube videos by URL, ID, or query and embeds a player.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompositions.ts: React Query hooks for listing, saving, loading, and deleting compositions using backend actor APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and tracking status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile through an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables including color tokens and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, grids, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, including implemented and pending feature requirements for amp controls and a music composer system.
